title: Spinach and Bacon Quiche
author: Paula Deen
ingredients: 1 9 inch refrigerated piecrust, fitted to a 9 inch glass pie plate
2 cups chopped packed fresh baby spinach
instructions: Combine the eggs, cream, salt, and pepper in a food processor or blender.
Layer the spinach, bacon, and cheese in the bottom of the pie crust.
Pour the egg mixture on top.
Bake for 35 to 45 minutes until the egg mixture is set.
